025package io.blt.util.functional;
026
027/**
028 * Represents an operation that accepts a single input argument that may throw.
029 *
030 * @param <T> the type of argument consumed by this consumer
031 * @param <E> the type of {@code Throwable} that may be thrown by this consumer
032 */
033@FunctionalInterface
034public interface ThrowingConsumer<T, E extends Throwable> {
035
036    /**
037     * Performs this operation on the given argument.
038     *
039     * @param t the input argument
040     * @throws E {@code Throwable} that may be thrown
041     */
042    void accept(T t) throws E;
043
044}
